examples.example: 生活中有一些惊喜总是能带给我们意想不到的快乐和感动。

translate.english: There are some surprises in life that can always bring us unexpected happiness and touching.

examples.example: 人生的旅途中有一些美好的风景值得我们去用心欣赏。

translate.english: There are some beautiful sceneries in the journey of life worthy of our careful appreciation.

examples.example: 这个世界上有一些美好等待我们去发现和感受。

translate.english: There are some beauties in this world waiting for us to discover and feel.
